name: SAG IPL
tagline: SAG IPL, Website & Mobile App Development Company
description:
SAG IPL is an ISO 27001: 2003 certified Mobile and Website Development Company located in India. Since its inception in 2010, the company has been engaged in offering comprehensive mobile app development, web development and digital marketing services to its clients on the global level.
They provide offshore website and mobile app development solutions, delivered to the clients on a pre-decided time frame and in a reasonable budget. The company has a talented team of experts, working very hard and dedicatedly on clientsâ€™ projects to ensure 100% satisfaction. In addition, they have a dedicated customer service team to assist clients with all their needs and queries.
Over the years, SAG IPL has managed to become one of the top IT companies in India through its constant determination to provide only the best and most affordable internet services to clients worldwide. They have built a solid reputation in the blockchain industry through a series of successful ICO and blockchain projects. Their blockchain team has a unique combination of expert developers, marketers and content writers who strive to make each new ICO/blockchain project a success for all their existing and potential clients.
SAG IPL offers the following web & mobile app development services:
Mobile App Development: IOS (iPhone & iPad), Android, Blackberry, Windows and AR App Development.
Web Design: UX/UI Design and Development, Responsive web/mobile design
Website Development: Web Application solutions on latest technologies like PHP, Laravel, Nodejs, Angularjs, etc., eCommerce website development, Python Web Application Development
ICO Development and Marketing: Blockchain Development, Exchange Development, Digital Wallet Development
Our Certifications:
ISO 27001:2013
CMMI Level 3
IAOP
Member of NASSCOM
Member of DSCI
